hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Would you like a receipt? preo do wellbutrin xl 150 mg Bisphenol A (BPA) was first synthesized in 1891, as a synthetic estrogen. In 1930, the properties of BPA were investigated and it made its return in the 1950s as polycarbonate and epoxy resin; most commonly found in plastic bottles and the inside lining of cans. Why would we want to package food in something that would effect our hormones? We know that hormones play a part in everything from weight to fertility to cancer, especially estrogen. And if a pregnant women is exposed and the fetus does not receive the right amount of hormones at critical formation times, it causes malformation in reproductive organs of both male and female babies. This could be a reason for the increasing rates of infertility. It was found in 1986 that BPA is pervasive and causes a host of health and reproductive problems. But the EPA is only concerned that the companies that produce the stuff are making money. They don’t work for the American people.
